name: twingate-connector
description: Twingate Connectors 是轻量级软件组件,在私有网络资源和授权用户之间建立安全的最小权限访问,而无需将网络暴露给互联网。它们充当受保护资源与 Twingate 基础设施之间的仅出站桥梁,确保零信任访问而无需 VPN。

notes.text: You can get your Twingate access or refresh tokens from the Twingate Admin Console. `https://auth.twingate.com/signup-v2`
If you need to update your access or refresh tokens, they can be found in /etc/twingate/connector.conf
